entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blue River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blue River Airport 06:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
